Texts.Chs:
泥巴，但这点剂量足以作为一种精神药物供艾肯使用以愉悦自己。
^red;醉酒^gray;，^white;35%^red;减速^gray;，^red;-^white;20^red;HP^gray;(^white;持续4m^gray;) (^white;只限艾肯^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Dirt, but in dose-size quantities for X'i to use recreationally as a psychotropic.
^red;Drunk^gray;, ^white;35% ^red;Slow^gray;, ^red;-^white;20 ^red;HP ^gray;(^white;4m^gray;) (^white;X'i Only^gray;)^reset;
